overview: Break away from the tourist pack and discover the true Barcelona with this off-the-beaten-track travel guide, which explores the city's funky neighborhoods, underground culture and other hidden treasures. Created for curious vacationers, the video samples bustling Barcelona's out-of-the-way nightclubs, fashion boutiques, tasty treats, parks and more. Also included is a survival kit, transportation tips and a must-do list.
title: In the City: In Barcelona
